question: With Flipkart which company received approval from the Competition Commission of India (CCI)?
explanation: Flipkart and eBay India approved by the Competition Commission of India (CCI) for subscription of Flipkart's shares issued by its Singapore-headquartered entity. In April, eBay Inc. had invested $500 million into Flipkart and sold its India business to the company to pick up a stake in Flipkart.
